subject: [Radiance-general] 9th International Radiance Workshop - stillneed some presenters!
body:
Dear Jan,
Although I have the flight and hotel booked, I will not know if I can go
until the last minute. For this reason I haven't registered yet.

Is it possible to keep a place for me on standing by? If I'm coming I
would also like to attend the advance course on Wednesday. If so can I pay
the registration on arrival?

Even if I can't make it Axel will.
Regards,
Luisa



--
Dr Luisa Brotas Arch PhD ARB RIBA
LEARN Low Energy Architecture Research Unit
London Metropolitan University
Faculty of Architecture and Spatial Design
Spring House
40-44 Holloway Road
London N7 8JL

Tel +44(0)2071334470
fax +44(0)2071334456
email l.brotas@londonmet.ac.uk
